abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Montreal Canadiens, 3-2, in overtime; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils rallied for a 3-2 victory over the N.H.L.-leading Canadiens on Saturday night in Montreal.

headline.main: Devils Defeat Canadiens in Overtime on the Road
headline.print_headline: Devils Defeat Canadiens in Overtime on the Road

snippet: The Devils rallied for a 3-2 victory over the N.H.L.-leading Canadiens on Saturday night in Montreal.
